This Course will teach the Student in a practical way, with lots of demonstrations, how to apply various Paint Techniques on Walls, Furniture and Decorative Items, Concrete and Metal.

items.title: Interior Design as a Business
items.headline: Let's Get Started on your Interior Design Business Journey
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to start an interior design business.
Students will learn the key concepts to having a successful interior design entrepreneurship
Courses will cover the business of design, branding & messaging, target market & entry methods, vendor and supplier relations, contracts and more
